parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Employee Position (Ex. Website Developer, Marketing Specialist, Application Developer, Content Writer, SEO Specialist, Social Media Manager, Graphics Designer, Videographer, Video Editor )

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description:
Separate using space. 
 Available Scopes: 
 1. info 
 2. service 
 3. team 
 4. accounts 
 5. review 
 6. activity

schema.example: info service team accounts review activity
